segments.text: So what brings you to my office today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long has your tooth been bothering you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It just started hurting me last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you injured your tooth in any way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think one of my fillings might be coming loose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a special kind of toothbrush that you like to use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it bother you when you eat something really sweet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah , when I do that , it hurts a lot more !
segments.speaker: S2
